NBA Study Reveals The UK Variant (B.1.117) May Last Longer In Human Hosts. Clearance phase - 8 Days VS 6.2 Days Infection phase - 13.3 Days VS 8.2 Days Peak viral load - 19ct VS 20.2ct The 10 Day ISOLATION should be REVIEWED for the new strains. https://t.co/06fpHzT1bH

@kushal_mehra @TVMohandasPai We see +75% tests, +100% +vity. Usually increase in tests lowers positivity. This tells us - 1. Intensity of the spread is very high. 2. With +20% positivity we can assume there is NO contact tracing. 3. As NO contact tracing - actual numbers could be much more.
@imbhojpuria Can't say exactly - but quite low today.

@Ms_Aflatoon Adverse event would not result in an COVID-19 infection. 1st dose should have built some antibodies. 2nd Dose would not have been much beneficial as it takes some time for it to be effective. Very unfortunate though. #VaccineDeathsIndia - tracking.

2/2 Helper T-cells stimulate B-cells to make antibodies and help killer cells develop. Killer T-cells directly kill cells that have been infected by a foreign invader. Largest study - 95% of subjects retained immune memory at ~6 months after infection. https://t.co/KtcHgXwYW1 https://t.co/ByuCQ1Hle5

#Covid19 Immunity = Antibodies Memory B cell, CD4 T cell, CD8 T cell. Even if a body losses Antibodies it develops a 2nd line of defense = LONG TERM Memory T B cells. B-cells fight bacteria and viruses by making antibodies. T Cells = Helper Killer T Cells. Contd .. 1/2
